column1: Please update Amasty Base module. Re-upload it and replace all the files.
column2: Please update Amasty Base module. Re-upload it and replace all the files.

column1: Enable stockstatus-graphql module to activate GraphQl and Custom Stock Status. Please, run the following command in the SSH: composer require amasty/stockstatus-graphql
column2: Enable stockstatus-graphql module to activate GraphQl and Custom Stock Status. Please, run the following command in the SSH: composer require amasty/stockstatus-graphql

column1: Allow Qty Below 0 (System Value - processed automatically)
column2: Allow Qty Below 0 (System Value - processed automatically)

column1: Allow Qty Below 0 and Notify Customer (System Value - processed automatically)
column2: Allow Qty Below 0 and Notify Customer (System Value - processed automatically)

column1: Yes, Out of stock options selectable
column2: Yes, Out of stock options selectable

column1: Yes, Out of stock options selectable and crossed-out
column2: Yes, Out of stock options selectable and crossed-out

column1: You can use the following variables: {qty-threshold}, {qty}, {tomorrow}, {day-after-tomorrow}, {yesterday}, {expected_date} or any product attributes.
column2: You can use the following variables: {qty-threshold}, {qty}, {tomorrow}, {day-after-tomorrow}, {yesterday}, {expected_date} or any product attributes.

column1: Display Custom Stock Status for `Out of Stock` Items Only
column2: Display Custom Stock Status for `Out of Stock` Items Only

column1: If set to `No`, custom stock status will be visible both for `in stock` and `out of stock` items.
column2: If set to `No`, custom stock status will be visible both for `in stock` and `out of stock` items.

column1: Display Default Stock Status with Custom Status
column2: Display Default Stock Status with Custom Status

column1: Use Quantity Ranges Based Statuses Only
column2: Use Quantity Ranges Based Statuses Only

column1: If set to `No`, custom stock status set for product will show up if no range status found for particular product.
column2: If set to `No`, custom stock status set for product will show up if no range status found for particular product.

column1: Activate Product Groups for Quantity Range Statuses
column2: Activate Product Groups for Quantity Range Statuses

column1: Use Out of Stock Threshold Value for Quantity Ranges
column2: Use Out of Stock Threshold Value for Quantity Ranges

column1: Display only icon and no custom status text on the product view and product list pages.
column2: Display only icon and no custom status text on the product view and product list pages.

column1: Display Custom Stock Status on Product List Page
column2: Display Custom Stock Status on Product List Page

column1: Display Custom Stock Status in Shopping Cart
column2: Display Custom Stock Status in Shopping Cart

column1: Will display custom stock status for items in shopping cart.
column2: Will display custom stock status for items in shopping cart.

column1: Show Custom Status in Order Confirmation Email
column2: Show Custom Status in Order Confirmation Email

column1: The information link will lead to any CMS page and will be displayed below the Custom Stock Status
column2: The information link will lead to any CMS page and will be displayed below the Custom Stock Status

column1: Show Out of Stock Configurable Attributes
column2: Show Out of Stock Configurable Attributes

column1: Enable 'Back In Stock' Alert for Out of Stock Configurable Items
column2: Enable 'Back In Stock' Alert for Out of Stock Configurable Items

column1: It notifies users when the product comes back to stock. To enable this feature install Out of Stock Notification plugin. See more details here
column2: It notifies users when the product comes back to stock. To enable this feature install Out of Stock Notification plugin. See more details here
